publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3185 Angela Constance: Riverside Primary School Attracts RBS Support—That the Parliament applauds the success of Riverside Primary School in attracting Royal Bank of Scotland (RBS) support for the redevelopment of the school’s eco garden and the production of a striking mosaic incorporating the school logo and acknowledges the worthwhile contribution that RBS makes with its Supergrounds scheme.

S3M-3185 Riverside Primary School Attracts RBS Support (lodged on 7 January 2009) Christina McKelvie*, Aileen Campbell*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Bashir Ahmad*, Bill Kidd*, Michael Matheson*, Karen Whitefield*, Keith Brown*

S3M-3185 Angela Constance: Riverside Primary School Attracts RBS Support—That the Parliament applauds the success of Riverside Primary School in attracting Royal Bank of Scotland (RBS) support for the redevelopment of the school’s eco garden and the production of a striking mosaic incorporating the school logo and acknowledges the worthwhile contribution that RBS makes with its Supergrounds scheme. Supported by: Christina McKelvie, Aileen Campbell, Shirley-Anne Somerville, Bashir Ahmad, Bill Kidd, Michael Matheson, Karen Whitefield, Keith Brown, Sandra White*
S3M-3185 Riverside Primary School Attracts RBS Support (lodged on 7 January 2009) Gil Paterson*
S3M-3185 Riverside Primary School Attracts RBS Support (lodged on 7 January 2009) Tom McCabe*
